game.name: OpenTTD
game.desc: OpenTTD is an open source reimplementation of the Microprose game Transport Tycoon Deluxe (TTD). As president of a start-up transportation company in (typically) 1950, you have a choice of building rail, road, air and maritime transportation routes to build up your transportation empire.

game.name: OpenTTD Server
game.desc: Starts a headless (No GUI) OpenTTD Server.
